data.persona: I love baking cookies.  I love my grandkids.  I have had a very good life.  I love going to bingo with my friends.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
This is a plain stone room with many trunks piled high.  There's tables with paper records stacked high along with writing instruments.
There's a table, a record, a crate, a trunk, and a manacle here.
The a priest is here.

You are carrying a book and a glass, and wearing a hair net, a gown, and a slipper.

data.short_motivation: I want to keel the glass and the book in the storage room
data.mid_motivation: I hope the priest would help me take care of the glass amd the bookfrom today
data.long_motivation: I hope the priest would give the glass and the book to my son when he returns in ila few months if I'm dead by then
